abstract: Stocks retreat from gains one day earlier due to concerns about economic growth in Europe and China.
lead_paragraph: More weakness in Chinese manufacturing, compounded by a cut in the European Union growth forecast, kept markets in check.

headline.main: Wall Street Retreats on Fears for China and Europe
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Retreats on Fears for China and Europe

snippet: More weakness in Chinese manufacturing, compounded by a cut in the European Union growth forecast, kept markets in check.
